org.archive.wayback.archivalurl

Class ServerSideHTMLReplayRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.archive.wayback.replay.TextReplayRenderer
      • org.archive.wayback.archivalurl.ServerSideHTMLReplayRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ReplayRenderer

    public class ServerSideHTMLReplayRenderer
extends TextReplayRenderer
    ArchivalUrl ReplayRenderer which uses a series of RegEx's to rewrite embedded URLs to point back into a specific ArchivalUrl AccessPoint.
    Version:
    $Date$, $Revision$
    Author:
    brad
